dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3188424J] URGENT! SECOND NOTICE! DMCA Copyright Infringement Notice
dmca.body:
-----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Thursday, February 22, 2007 7:18 AM To: Copyright Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3188424J] URGENT! SECOND NOTICE! DMCA Copyright Infringement Notice Jamiewestenhiser.org (70.85.178.178) ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. URGENT! SECOND NOTICE! DMCA Copyright Infringement Notice Jamiewestenhiser.org (70.85.178.178) Added by system at Thursday, Feb 22 2007 01:14 pm X-MailFrom: TCherkashina@playboy.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Thu Feb 22 13:14:04 2007 Received: (qmail 26862 invoked by alias); 22 Feb 2007 19:14:04 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 26859 invoked from network); 22 Feb 2007 19:14:04 -0000 Received: from smtp02.theplanet.com (70.87.6.111) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 22 Feb 2007 19:14:04 -0000 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Thu, 22 Feb 2007 13:14:04 -0600 Return-path: Delivery-date: Thu, 22 Feb 2007 13:14:04 -0600 Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181] helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from TCherkashina@playboy.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HKJOG-0005CW-4J for abuse@theplanet.com; Thu, 22 Feb 2007 13:14:04 -0600 Received: from mx.la.playboy.com ([216.163.128.15]) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from TCherkashina@playboy.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HKJOF-000G67-MV for abuse@theplanet.com; Thu, 22 Feb 2007 13:14:03 -0600 X-ASG-Debug-ID: 1172171630-705900160000-bhdmkB X-Barracuda-URL: http://216.163.128.15:8000/cgi-bin/mark.cgi X-Barracuda-Connect: chexch.playboy.com[10.20.20.100] X-Barracuda-Start-Time: 1172171630 X-ASG-Whitelist: Client Received: from CHEXCH.playboy.com (chexch.playboy.com [10.20.20.100]) by MX.LA.playboy.com (Spam Firewall) with ESMTP id 9C36013E540; Thu, 22 Feb 2007 11:13:50 -0800 (PST) X-Ninja-PIM: Scanned by Ninja X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft Exchange V6.5 Content-class: urn:content-classes:message MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----_=_NextPart_001_01C756B5.A8DDBCC5" X-ASG-Orig-Subj: URGENT! SECOND NOTICE! DMCA Copyright Infringement Notice Jamiewestenhiser.org (70.85.178.178) Subject: URGENT! SECOND NOTICE! DMCA Copyright Infringement Notice Jamiewestenhiser.org (70.85.178.178) Date: Thu, 22 Feb 2007 13:13:48 -0600 Message-ID: <9A8EFDB8A197B8478D3FFE26E86C16DF05614ADD@chexch.playboy.com> Thread-Topic: URGENT! SECOND NOTICE! DMCA Copyright Infringement Notice Jamiewestenhiser.org (70.85.178.178) Thread-Index: AcdVPlzv6OvDN4kaSWKMWmKBV46GFwBdyS5g Importance: high From: "Cherkashina, Tatyana" To: , Priority: Urgent X-Priority: 1 X-Barracuda-Virus-Scanned: by Barracuda Spam Firewall at playboy.com Received-SPF: pass (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: domain of playboy.com designates 216.163.128.15 as permitted sender) client-ip=216.163.128.15; envelope-from=TCherkashina@playboy.com; helo=MX.LA.playboy.com; X-OriginalArrivalTime: 22 Feb 2007 19:14:04.0355 (UTC) FILETIME=[9E051130:01C756B5] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) February 22, 2007 ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. 1333 North Stemmons Freeway Suite 110 Dallas, TX 75207 US copyright@theplanet.com abuse@theplanet.com Dear Sir or Madam: It has been brought to our attention that web pages at Jamiewestenhiser.org (70.85.178.178) display, without authorization, reproductions of images owned by Playboy Enterprises International, Inc. ("Playboy"). All right, title and interest in and to these images belongs to Playboy. I believe in good faith that the disputed images displayed on Jamiewestenhiser.org (70.85.178.178) are not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent or the law. Accordingly, please remove the unauthorized reproductions of Playboy copyrighted images on Jamiewestenhiser.org (70.85.178.178) and on all web pages under your control. Examples of the copyrighted material can be found at the following links: http://www.jamiewestenhiser.org/links.html http://www.jamiewestenhiser.org/pictures.html http://www.jamiewestenhiser.org/videos.html http://www.jamiewestenhiser.org/downloads.html I, Tatyana Cherkashina, under penalty of perjury, am authorized to act on behalf of Playboy Enterprises International, Inc. in regard to the above-mentioned unauthorized reproduction of the Playboy copyrighted images. My contact information is as follows: Playboy Enterprises International, Inc., 680 N. Lake Shore Drive, Chicago, Illinois 60611, Fax 312-266-2042, phone 312-751-8000, E-mail address is tcherkashina@playboy.com. We look forward to hearing from you and resolving this matter immediately. This letter is not intended to and shall not waive or prejudice any rights and remedies that Playboy may have at law, in equity or otherwise. Any and all such rights and remedies are hereby expressly reserved. PLAYBOY ENTERPRISES INTERNATIONAL, INC. Tatyana Cherkashina Intellectual Property Assistant cc: Ana Cashman, Esq. February 22, 2007

Dear Sir or Madam:

I believe in good faith that the disputed images displayed on Jamiewestenhiser.org (70.85.178.178) are not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent or the law.

Accordingly, please remove the unauthorized reproductions of Playboy copyrighted images on Jamiewestenhiser.org (70.85.178.178) and on all web pages under your control.

Examples of the copyrighted material can be found at the following links:

http://www.jamiewesten hiser.org/links.html
